definition: that (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 那[na4]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: Even if you are being in love very appropriately, that marriage later?
sentences.chinese: 就算你喺談拍拖好合適，嗰個結婚以後呢？

sentences.english: I went as an intern in that tight last summer.
sentences.chinese: 去年夏天我在嗰家商倁實習。

sentences.english: I learn from the doctor who have to use chinese and western medical for me.
sentences.chinese: 我學今日用中西何合璧幫我睇病嘅嗰個醫生。

sentences.english: It involves a lot of hard go.
sentences.chinese: 嗰需嘦很多的辛勤工作。

sentences.english: I can put up with a lot of things, but the above I can not accept.
sentences.chinese: 好多嘅懷事我可以接受但系嗰啲我接受唔到。

sentences.english: The basket ball competition is exciting.
sentences.chinese: 嗰次籃球冠軍賽真激動人心。

sentences.english: He said he was going to Europe on business for two weeks and needed to borrow $5,000.
sentences.chinese: 咃說咃預俻詘鎈往歐洲兩嗰周崾借款5000媄釒。

sentences.english: Think not of them, thou hast thy music too.
sentences.chinese: 莫想佢俚，汝也有自簡嗰音樂。

sentences.english: All Plays. I am a person whom layout the stage and background.
sentences.chinese: 所囿菂恏戲，都遈硪辷嗰魜佈置菂舞臺和背景。

definition: some/few/a little (Cantonese)
to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
used in transliteration
he (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 他[ta1]
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
possessive particle (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 的[de5]
Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
to know/to reprimand/to urge/to long for/to tell/to inform
so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
correct/suitable/to suit sb/just now (Cantonese)
(literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
to look for (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 找[zhao3]
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
to confer on/to give to
thing/matter (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
awry (mouth)/askew/Taiwan pr. [kuai1]
to squint/what? (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
